attributes.action: Let the uk public vote on should we be sending 3billion  a year to  Ukraine .
attributes.additional_details: The government work for the public. Not the other way about. One man should not be able to dictate what happens to the tax we pay. Let the uk public have a say where our taxes go.
attributes.background: Let the uk public decide should we continue giving 3billion a year to Ukraine. The uk public should have a say.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702489
